title: The Pandemic Forced Baseball to Rethink Everything
itunes:title: The Pandemic Forced Baseball to Rethink Everything
description:
Who thought it would happen? Major League Baseball playoffs are going on, and it's been must-see TV. That's great news for MLB Network President Rob McGlarry. He joined Jason, Mike and Michael to discuss how much work has gone into making all this possible, how it's not over yet, and how baseball isn't wasting the crisis by trying all sorts of new things to appeal to the next generation of fans.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
